items.title: Charges against Brazil's Bolsonaro are political, says lawyer
items.description: The former Brazilian president denies conspiring to overturn his 2022 election loss to his left-wing rival, Luiz In√°cio Lula da Silva.

items.title: China's Xi steals the limelight in a defiant push against US-led world order
items.description: President Xi shows off his power and influence in an open challenge to US supremacy and the world order.

items.title: Xi, Putin and Kim show united front at huge Chinese military parade
items.description: Speaking during the spectacle in Beijing, China's President Xi Jinping said the world faced a choice between peace and war.

items.title: Race to find survivors after Sudan landslide kills hundreds
items.description: Sunday's landslide followed heavy rain and "levelled" a remote village, a local armed group says.

items.title: Trump says 11 killed in US strike on drug-carrying vessel from Venezuela
items.description: The Trump administration has signalled a willingness to use military force against drug cartels.
